name: Phantasm (itch) (Combador)
description:
A simple 2D adventure that I created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 
The game was made in Unity in 6 days (around 30 hours of work), coding, level design, testing/ balancing, and UI design was done entirely by myself. I used some assets from the following links:

2D assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-top-down-basic-1...

2D particles: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/free-2d-impact-fx-201222

Music by GuilhermeBernardes from Pixabay

Sounds from: https://freesound.org
